msContents.summary: Cultivators of Edfu had stolen a bull from Irt-@r-r.w, the father of Party A (name lost). Party A then sued the cultivators and apparently won the case and was then compensated for the theft. As a consequense of this restitution, party A forswears any further claims and guarntees to protect Party B from any furure claims.

condition.ab: The papyrus has a big margins at the left and bottom sides. It is damaged at the top downwards to the middle as a result of verical folds and on horizontal. It has one kolessis almost at the middle. The papyrus has been taped in several places, espacilally at Verso with a big piece of tape. Three small, related fragments are still unconstructed yet. Some restoration is needed. (MA)
